ArticleTitle.sentence: Human neutrophils express GH-N gene transcripts and the pituitary transcription factor Pit-1b.

event.clue: Human neutrophils express GH-N gene transcripts and the pituitary transcription factor Pit-1b.
Human neutrophils express GH-N gene transcripts and the pituitary transcription factor Pit-1b.

AbstractText.sentence: Since GH stimulates the development and function of granulocytes, we investigated the expression of GH in granulocyte subsets.

event.clue: Since GH stimulates the development and function of granulocytes, we investigated the expression of GH in granulocyte subsets.
Since GH stimulates the development and function of granulocytes, we investigated the expression of GH in granulocyte subsets.
Since GH stimulates the development and function of granulocytes, we investigated the expression of GH in granulocyte subsets.

Since GH stimulates the development and function of granulocytes, we investigated the expression of GH in granulocyte subsets.

AbstractText.sentence: By immunocytochemistry, 25 +/- 7% of the human neutrophils were shown to express immunoreactive GH, whereas eosinophils were negative.

event.clue: By immunocytochemistry, 25 +/- 7% of the human neutrophils were shown to express immunoreactive GH, whereas eosinophils were negative.
By immunocytochemistry, 25 +/- 7% of the human neutrophils were shown to express immunoreactive GH, whereas eosinophils were negative.

AbstractText.sentence: Reversed transcription (RT)-PCR analysis demonstrated GH mRNA in neutrophils.

event.clue: Reversed transcription (RT)-PCR analysis demonstrated GH mRNA in neutrophils.

AbstractText.sentence: Restriction analysis revealed that neutrophils express the GH-N gene but not the GH-V gene.

event.clue: Restriction analysis revealed that neutrophils express the GH-N gene but not the GH-V gene.
Restriction analysis revealed that neutrophils express the GH-N gene but not the GH-V gene.

AbstractText.sentence: Furthermore, we demonstrated by western blot analysis that neutrophils express an alternatively spliced variant of the pituitary transcription factor Pit-1, designated Pit-1b.

event.clue: Furthermore, we demonstrated by western blot analysis that neutrophils express an alternatively spliced variant of the pituitary transcription factor Pit-1, designated Pit-1b.
Furthermore, we demonstrated by western blot analysis that neutrophils express an alternatively spliced variant of the pituitary transcription factor Pit-1, designated Pit-1b.
